snippet: Minnesota Timberwolves head coach Rick Adelman announced his retirement from coaching in the NBA on Monday after 23 seasons in the league calling the shots for five different teams....

headline.print_headline: Timberwolves Coach Adelman Retires After 23 Seasons
headline.main: Timberwolves Coach Adelman Retires After 23 Seasons

lead_paragraph: Minnesota Timberwolves head coach Rick Adelman announced his retirement from coaching in the NBA on Monday after 23 seasons in the league calling the shots for five different teams.
